amendment.description: Amendment to grant limited civil liability protection to health professionals that volunteer at federally declared disaster sites.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-416 to grant limited civil liability protection to health professionals that volunteer at federally declared disaster sites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 157, 1 Present (Roll no. 124).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Stearns.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 157, 1 Present (Roll no. 124).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
